text: Yefrem Yevseyevich Sokolov (; , 25 April 1926 - 5 April 2022) was the first secretary of the Communist Party of Byelorussian SSR from February 1988 to November 1990. Sokolov was a member of the Politburo. He was elected on 14 July 1990.Worldstatesmen.org Sokolov died on 5 April 2022, three weeks before his 96th birthday.Умер один из последних глав БССР ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Communists Category:Soviet politicians
title: Yefrem Sokolov
